reviewText: From the excellent opening by the one and only KC right through to the last number, this dvd concert is a smash. Theres not a bad performance here amongst the original disco stalwarts, and they sound just as fresh and exciting today as they did all those years ago. The audience is clearly enthusiastic and loving every minute of it...and its a joy to watch...I wish I was there. All of these songs are absolute classics. This is a must have dvd for anyone who loves disco and dance music.
summary: Put on your boogie shoes and get down

reviewText: This is an excellent show.  What I especially like about it is that most of the songs done by the original artists are better than the original recordings.  Taste of Honey in particular are great.  You may have to look hard, but there is a second, Part 2 Dvd of this that is almost as good.

reviewText: We saw the original program as a pledge night on PBS. Although it had many interruptions, we still saw and heard many of our favorites from that era. When we received the DVD, we played it and totally enjoyed it. Great job TJ Lubinsky. Like we were in the audience.

reviewText: I purchased this DVD on the basis of the reviews it got from music lovers. I was not disapointed.What stunning performances from all the artists. The video is also wel recorded. The colour is good.I would recommend this to all 70's & 80's music lovers. Many of these artists never visited South Africa, sovideos like this give us an idea what taken we missed during the apartheid period.If there are any other similar dvd's let me know. I have also purchased the Get Down tonight Vol 2 dvd. Also a classic. Thanks and enjoy!!!

reviewText: Classic disco hits performed with style and energy by the original artists in front of an enthusiastic audience. Very good quality. This DVD proves how great (and timeless) the music of the 70s are. Throw in Chic's "Live At Montreux 2004" DVD and you'll never have to leave the house. So get yourself a good sound system and enjoy the show!
summary: THIS IS THE WAY I LIKE IT...

reviewText: This dvd of the disco explosion live is a super album,with your favorite singers and groups,belting out some the greatest hits around,from the disco era...Even if you were never a fan of disco,this dvd,will make you rock...The performances,were fresh and alive,the audience thrilled...The music never sounded better...This album is a must have for disco fans of all ages.I own and highly recommend this disc....Thank you stewart L.
summary: A super disco album live from asbury park The disco explosion is a must have for disco and oldie fans of all ages.

reviewText: Several people mentioned they felt the audio quality is not so great. Actually, the audio quality is very, very good. The problem is, the center channel volume was recorded waaaay too low, causing the vocals to sort of get lost in the side channel ambience. If you listen to this DVD through a multi-channel surround sound system, simply use your remote to boost only the center channel volume by 7-10 dB, and the sound stage balance is brought back into perfect harmony. It is then that you realize that the overall audio quality was not the problem. Stereo-only listeners, however, will indeed be let down by the audio. The only downside to boosting the center volume comes between songs, when the announcers are eardrum-shatteringly loud, causing one to have to toggle the volume up and down throughout the DVD. But even that should not cause one to miss this terrific performance!
summary: A tip to vastly improve the audio quality...
